full_summary:
=================
### Title
Senior Change Management Consultant - Request for Proposal

### Reference Information
* **Reference Number:** PW-22-01013170
* **Amendment Number:** 0
* **Publication Date:** November 10, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** December 5, 2022, 14:00:00

### Contract Information
* **Contracting Entity:** Canadian Food Inspection Agency
* **Address:** 1400 Merivale Road, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0Y9, Canada
* **End User Entity:** Canadian Food Inspection Agency

### Contact Information
* **Contact Name:** Ronald Staigh
* **Email:** [ron.staigh@inspection.gc.ca](mailto:ron.staigh@inspection.gc.ca)
* **Address:** 59 Camelot Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0Y9, Canada

### Tender Description
The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) seeks a Senior Change Management Consultant to improve the adoption of the Canadian Food Safety Information Network (CFSIN). This procurement is conditionally set aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business. The procurement is open to both Indigenous and non-Indigenous businesses. However, if two or more Indigenous businesses submit a bid, the procurement is set aside under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business.

The contract period will be from the date of contract to March 31, 2023. The work is currently not being performed by a contracted resource.

### Requirements
* The Senior Change Management Consultant will develop and implement a change management plan to improve the adoption of the CFSIN.
* The consultant will work with stakeholders to understand their needs and develop solutions to address them.
* The consultant will provide ongoing support and guidance to ensure successful implementation of the change management plan.

### Preference Criteria
This requirement is open to Tier 1 Indigenous Supply Arrangement Holders who qualified for services in the National Capital Region for the following category: One (1) Senior Level Change Management Consultant.

### Documents
Please refer to the attached documents for additional information on the tender process and requirements.

**Attachments**

* [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/10/3426c6534da873f9cc2562f57be922e5/2023-00486_npp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/
